SETTINGS.useRecovery.name: Recovery Points
SETTINGS.useRecovery.hint: Use the Recovery Points (RP) optional rule.
SETTINGS.useFortune.name: Luck Points
SETTINGS.useFortune.hint: Use the Luck Points (LP) optional rule.
SETTINGS.useMana.name: Mana Points
SETTINGS.useMana.hint: Use the Mana Points (MP) optional rule.
SETTINGS.useDamageResistance.name: Damage resistance
SETTINGS.useDamageResistance.hint: Display damage resistance on the character sheet.
SETTINGS.displayDifficulty.name: Display difficulty
SETTINGS.displayDifficulty.hint: Activates the difficulty display on skill/attribute and weapon rolls.
SETTINGS.displayDifficulty.none: Do not use or display the difficulty
SETTINGS.displayDifficulty.all: Use the difficulty and display it for everyone
SETTINGS.displayDifficulty.gm: Use the difficulty and display it only to the GM
SETTINGS.useComboRolls.name: Activate combo rolls for attack and damages
SETTINGS.useComboRolls.hint: Allows attack and damage rolls to be made simultaneously.
SETTINGS.useVarInit.name: Using the variable initiative rule
SETTINGS.useVarInit.hint: The result of an explosive d6 is added to the initiative: add and re-roll on 6.
SETTINGS.useIncompetentPJ.name: Using the rule of PJs' incompetence
SETTINGS.useIncompetentPJ.hint: A weapon or armour not mastered gives different malus.
SETTINGS.useOverload.name: Using the overload rule
SETTINGS.useOverload.hint: The overload of the armour causes malus to DEX rolls.
SETTINGS.displayChatDamageButtonsToAll.h: Displays damage application buttons in chat messages to everyone.
SETTINGS.moveItem.name: How to move items
SETTINGS.moveItem.hint: Behaviour of the drag & drop of an item on a character sheet (Hold Shift when dropping to do the opposite).
SETTINGS.lockItems.name: Locking objects
SETTINGS.lockDuringPause.name: Locking during Pause mode
SETTINGS.lockDuringPause.hint: Prohibit players from modifying characters and objects during Pause mode
SETTINGS.checkFreeHandsBeforeEquip.name: Hands-free check
SETTINGS.checkFreeHandsBeforeEquip.hint: Check that the character has enough free hands to equip an item (Hold Shift to ignore the check)
SETTINGS.checkFreeHandsBeforeEquip.gm: Verification (can only be ignored by the GM)
SETTINGS.checkArmorSlotAvailability.name: Checking armour locations
SETTINGS.checkArmorSlotAvailability.hint: Check availability of a slot before equipping armour (Hold Shift to ignore the check)
SETTINGS.checkArmorSlotAvailability.gm: Verification (can only be ignored by the GM)
SETTINGS.explosiveDice.name: Explosive dice for damages
SETTINGS.explosiveDice.hint: If activated, the damage uses the explosive dice rule
SETTINGS.useMadness.name: Madness points
SETTINGS.useMadness.hint: Display the points of madness on the character sheet
SETTINGS.settingCyberpunk.name: Cyberpunk setting
SETTINGS.settingCyberpunk.hint: Change the rules to calculate MP
SETTINGS.useActionSound.name: Sound for actions
SETTINGS.useActionSound.hint: Play a sound for some actions
